typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as string,
		{Rotton Tomato} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
source1 sink(input(
		MovieIdDupe as integer,
		ActionDupe as string,
		MovieId as integer,
		Title as string,
		Genre as string,
		Year as integer,
		Rating as integer,
		RottenTom as integer,
		Action as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionBy('key',
		0,
		movie
	)) ~> sink1
